text: "The Radio" is a song co-written and recorded by American country music artist Vince Gill. It was released in June 1988 as the fourth single from his 1987 album The Way Back Home. The song reached #39 on the Billboard Hot Country Singles & Tracks chart. The song was written by Gill and Reed Nielsen. ==Chart performance== {|class="wikitable sortable" ! Chart (1988) !
